mapper.insert: insert into t_log(operator, modular, action, operatingtime,systemtype) values (#{operator},#{modular},#{action},#{operatingtime},#{systemtype})
mapper.select: select (SELECT Count(*) from t_user where areacode like concat('%',#{Areacode},'%') and usersystem=3) AS Totalnumber,(SELECT count(*) from t_log where systemtype='1' and ascii(operator) in (SELECT id from t_user where areacode like concat('%',#{Areacode},'%') and usersystem=3) ) AS Usernumber
